nodes.text: Falcon was a male Nautolan agent of the Republic Strategic Information Service living during the Galactic War. During the Battle of Ilum in 3640 BBY he determined that Imperial forces were hiding their transmissions by bouncing them between the droids and asked a Republic citizen to destroy the droids involved.
Agent Falcon appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as an NPC on Ilum, who begins the mission "Jam the Transmissions."
